channel.title: Extremely difficult problem
channel.description: ok. this problem is hard to explain, my router sucks itself at night, not even joking. anyways, it refuses to be portforwarded. it is a piece of crap model that a local company gave me for free. i was wondering if i could direct route my internet into my computer and blow the thing up. i am trying to make a server called RoidScape the forums are here (roidscape.darkbb.com) feel free to visit. anyways i have made the forums what i need is either a way to not portforward or a diffrent base client but it would still need portforwarding. i have no clue about portforwarding it is hard to explain and difficult to understand but if you tell me it in a paragraph that isnt as sloppy as mine is i may be able to understand. im an A+ student with a great imagination i can understand or at least begin to comprehend. anyways! again. i need a way to skip portforwarding embed the server on my forums and mabye even find out if my router is already portforwarded...i have tried everything this is my last resort i already tried the utorrent thing and idk if it failed.

item.title: Extremely difficult problem
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

like i said i already tried this. it wouldnt work for me either. so no i am not dumb you are my good sir

also…i am quite certain that my router is indeed working. it has no problems other than the faulty unuseability.

some help please?

Read full topic

item.title: Extremely difficult problem
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Your router is not working… This idea comes out of the blue, there is 99.99 9/10% chance that it won’t work, but did you try buying a new router?

P.S: Your fucking advertising.
